A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I left the theater thinking “what the hell was that”. It’s like the Johnson hadn’t even seen previous Star Wars films and was given a brief overview of the premise and universe. I can’t believe he’s signed on for 3 more! All the buzz articles I read had me really thinking this would be the masterpiece I’ve been waiting for. It was worse than any of the prequels! Everything was either taken to the extreme or just cast off as inessential. There was nothing in between. It seems like so far it is really polarizing but I’m on the end of the spectrum that thinks Lea shouldn’t all of the sudden have the ability to live in the vacuum of space having suddenly tapped into her massive force abilities. So dumb. The crystal fox and Chewy were cool.
